informant_dialogs.dialog_message: #name, a journalist, published an article a week ago without any sort of fact-checking...
Later on, #name received numerous backlashes from the netizens for not evaluating sources.
#name lost both the job and reputation. Everything seemed hopeless until...
Rumors are spreading that mother of celebrity Buoyancee is against her daughter's wedding with rapper Jay C.
I need to shed light on the truth here. I need to regain my credibility as a journalist.
I better research how to evaluate my sources first before publishing my own. Wait, what's this?
CRAAP Fact Checking method? Hmm. Interesting.
I better start working. I'll bring this guide with me.
